title: Captain John's Treasure Contains Ancient Weapons or Poneglyphs
theoryText: Some fans theorize that Captain John, as a former member of the Rocks Pirates, might have possessed information about Ancient Weapons or Road Poneglyphs. His legendary treasure that Buggy seeks might not just be gold and jewels, but could contain crucial information about the Void Century or the location of Laugh Tale. This would explain why the treasure is considered so legendary and why it's been sought after for so long.
author: r/OnePiece community

sources.title: Did Oda forget about Captain John's legendary treasure?

title: Buggy Will Use Captain John's Treasure to Fund Cross Guild
theoryText: Fans have theorized that Buggy's eventual discovery of Captain John's treasure will provide the funding necessary for the Cross Guild organization in later arcs. The treasure map received in Episode 424 could be a setup for Buggy's rise to Yonko status, as the wealth would allow him to recruit powerful fighters and establish his reputation.
author: One Piece Theory Community

title: Impel Down Levels Represent the Five Elders
theoryText: A theory suggests that each level of Impel Down corresponds to one of the Five Elders and their potential Devil Fruit abilities. The torture methods on each level (fire, beasts, heat, freezing, etc.) might foreshadow the abilities of the Five Elders who were revealed to have mythical Zoan fruits. Level 1's Crimson Hell with its blade trees could represent one Elder's power over cutting/slashing abilities.
author: OP Fan Page
